contentrichtext.text: '''Battle of Baghdad''' may refer to: *[[Battle of Baghdad (946)]], Buyid-Hamdanid War *[[Battle of Baghdad (1258)]], Mongol conquest of Baghdad *[[Battle of Baghdad (1401)]], conquests of Tamerlane *[[Battle of Baghdad (1534)]], Turko-Persian War *[[Capture of Baghdad (1623)]], Turko-Persian War *[[Capture of Baghdad (1638)]], Turko-Persian War *[[Fall of Baghdad (1917)]], World War I *[[Iraq coup (1941)]], World War II *[[Battle of Baghdad (2003)]], United States invasion of Iraq ==See also== *[[Siege of Baghdad (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
